title: Fierce Biotech Fundraising Tracker: Enlaza launches with $61M; Enveda brings in $68M
author: Gabrielle Masson; Max Bayer
description: Editor's Note: This version of the Fierce Biotech Fundraising Tracker covering July 19, 2022, through the end of the year has been retired. | As venture capital pours into budding biotechs, we're launching the Fierce Biotech Fundraising Tracker to keep tabs on all things financing.
